text: Cadillac Man is a 1990 comedy movie. It was directed by Roger Donaldson. The movie stars Robin Williams and Tim Robbins. The movie is about the problems of a car salesman in New York City. These problems include his wife wanting alimony, his two mistresses, his missing daughter and money owed to the Mafia. The movie was released in May 1990. Category:1990 comedy movies Category:1990 movies Category:American comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Roger Donaldson
title: Cadillac Man
